# AI AppSec Consulting

> Expert cybersecurity consulting in Application Security, DevSecOps, Product Security, Supply Chain Security, and AI/ML Defense. Led by Viswanath Chirravuri — GSE #335, SANS Associate Instructor, CompTIA SME, RSA 2024 & 2026 Speaker, and Doctor of Engineering candidate in Cybersecurity.

AI AppSec Consulting provides hands-on, hourly consulting sessions across AI/ML security and application security domains. All consulting is delivered one-on-one with direct expert access, tailored to client environments, and globally available across time zones.

## Consulting Services — AI/ML Security ($300/hr)

- [Strategy Session](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Executive consultation, security program assessment & AI/ML security roadmap planning ($300/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [LLM Application Security](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): OWASP Top 10 for LLMs, prompt injection defense, output validation & sensitive data exposure mitigation ($300/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [RAG Security & Architecture](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): RAG pipeline hardening, vector database security, document poisoning prevention & 15+ RAG strategy security analysis ($300/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [Agentic AI Security](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Multi-agent system boundaries, tool-use exploitation prevention, MCP security & autonomous agent guardrails ($300/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [MLSecOps & Pipeline Security](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): ML pipeline hardening (MLflow, Kubeflow, SageMaker), model supply chain security & training data integrity ($300/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [Secure AI-Assisted Development](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Vibecoding tools security (Claude Code, Cline, Cursor, Gemini CLI), agentic SAST/SCA & AI coding governance ($300/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [Enterprise AI Security Engagement](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Multi-day comprehensive AI/ML security program (custom quote)

## Consulting Services — Application Security ($200/hr)

- [Product Security Advisory](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Threat modeling, secure architecture review & software supply chain strategy ($200/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [SAST Implementation](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Static analysis tool setup (Semgrep, SonarQube, CodeQL, Bandit) & CI/CD pipeline integration ($200/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [SCA Implementation](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Dependency analysis (OWASP Dependency-Check, Grype, Trivy, OSV Scanner), SBOM generation & composition governance ($200/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [DAST Implementation](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Dynamic testing (OWASP ZAP, Nikto, Wapiti, Nuclei) & runtime security analysis ($200/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [SBOM & Supply Chain Advisory](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): SBOM management (Syft, CycloneDX, SPDX), provenance strategy (Cosign, SLSA) & Dependency-Track setup ($200/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [DevSecOps Pipeline Consulting](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): CI/CD security, IaC scanning (Checkov, TFSec), container hardening & policy-as-code ($200/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [OWASP Tools Advisory](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): OWASP ZAP, Dependency-Check, ASVS, SAMM & Threat Dragon implementation ($200/hr, 1–4 hrs)
- [Enterprise AppSec Engagement](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Multi-day DevSecOps transformation & program building (custom quote)

## Pages

- [Home](https://aiappsecacademy.com/): Overview of consulting services, consultant credentials, and how it works
- [Services](https://aiappsecacademy.com/services): Full catalog of consulting services with pricing and details
- [About](https://aiappsecacademy.com/about): Consultant profile — 20+ years in cybersecurity, 35+ certifications, GIAC Security Expert
- [Why Us](https://aiappsecacademy.com/why-us): Value proposition — direct expert consulting, hands-on implementation, transparent pricing
- [Blog](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog): Articles and insights on AI/ML security and application security
- [Open Source](https://aiappsecacademy.com/open-source): Contributions including Secure-ML Framework, OWASP Secure Coding Practices, ML RAG Strategies, and ML research
- [FAQ](https://aiappsecacademy.com/faq): Frequently asked questions about consulting services, booking, scheduling, and deliverables

## Blog — Securing AI/ML

- [15 RAG Strategies Every AI Engineer Should Know](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/ml-rag-strategies): A comprehensive guide to 15 RAG approaches with Python implementations, architecture diagrams, and security considerations
- [The Evolution of Agentic AI Development: From Monolithic to Distributed Systems](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/agentic-ai-evolution): A practical journey through 4 architectural stages of building secure, local-first multi-agent AI systems
- [Introducing ViswanathSChirravuri_GPT: The Next Phase of Resume Exchange](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/viswanathschirravuri-gpt): A dedicated Custom GPT that answers questions about the consultant's professional profile
- [From Monolith to Micro-Agents: My 4-Stage Journey in Building Secure Local AI Systems](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/from-monolith-micro-agents-my-4-stage-journey-secure-local-2qcjc/): Four architectural phases for building a local AI system with security safeguards
- [Why "AI Skills Developer" Will Be the Breakout Role of 2026](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/why-ai-skills-developer-breakout-role-2026-viswanath-s-chirravuri-lpyzc/): An emerging role combining software engineering with LLM orchestration
- [AI/ML Security: Old Attacks, New Targets](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/aiml-security-old-attacks-new-targets-viswanath-s-chirravuri-m7i3c/): How adversaries apply classic attack techniques to AI systems
- [Evolving Protocols Around Agentic AI: MCP, A2A, ACP, AGNTCY](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/agentic-ai-mcp-a2a-acp-agntcy-viswanath-s-chirravuri-x3cuc/): Emerging standards for agent-based AI systems
- [The 3 Phases of AI Mastery: Skills, Tools, Roles, and Privacy Practices](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/path-mastering-aiml-step-by-step-approach-viswanath-chirravuri-i9lyc/): Three AI proficiency levels with security considerations
- [ML Cyberattacks Taxonomy](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/ml-cyberattacks-taxonomy-vis-chirravuri/): Framework for understanding cyberattacks targeting ML systems
- [Security & Privacy Risks in Machine Learning](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/security-privacy-risks-machine-learning-vis-chirravuri/): Threats to data confidentiality, model integrity, and mitigation strategies

## Blog — Application Security

- [Introducing Product Security AI Skills: The Toolkit for Modern AppSec](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/product-security-ai-skills): 36 open-source AI agent skills spanning SAST, SCA, DAST, container security, IaC scanning, secret detection, cloud security, and more
- [Introducing ThreatModelingGPT: Your AI-Powered Threat Intelligence Partner](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/threatmodelinggpt): A free Custom GPT for threat modeling using STRIDE, PASTA, LINDDUN, MAESTRO, and more
- [AppSec Using Agentic AI: Running SCA Scans via Claude CLI Skills](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/appsec-using-agentic-ai-running-sca-scans-via-claude-cli-chirravuri-564cc/): Automating SCA scans through Claude CLI Skills
- [Secure Source Code by Design with Cline](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/secure-source-code-design-cline-practical-guide-teams-chirravuri-pfemc/): Configuring Cline to enforce OWASP security standards during code generation
- [Artifact Digital Signing and Verifying with Sigstore Cosign](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/artifact-digital-signing-verifying-sigstore-cosign-chirravuri/): Digital signing and verification for software supply chain security

## Open Source Contributions

- [Product Security AI Skills](https://github.com/vchirrav/product-security-ai-skills): 36 ready-to-use AI agent skills for security scanning (SAST, SCA, DAST, containers, IaC, secrets, cloud, mobile, network, supply chain)
- [Secure-ML Framework](https://github.com/thalesgroup/secure-ml): End-to-end ML pipeline security framework with 40+ curated open-source security tools. Presented at OWASP LASCON 2024.
- [OWASP Secure Coding Practices (Markdown)](https://github.com/vchirrav/owasp-secure-coding-md): 22 modular rule files for security domains with Claude Code Skills integration and MCP server deployment
- [ML RAG Strategies](https://github.com/vchirrav/ml-rag-strategies): 15 Retrieval-Augmented Generation strategies with Python implementations, architecture diagrams, and security best practices
- [ML Research: Local LLM Fine-Tuning](https://github.com/vchirrav/ml_research): HuggingFace Transformers and PEFT/LoRA fine-tuning on cybersecurity data with GGUF conversion and Ollama deployment

## Custom GPTs

- [ViswanathSChirravuri_GPT](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/viswanathschirravuri-gpt): A dedicated Custom GPT that answers questions about the consultant's professional profile
- [ThreatModelingGPT](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/threatmodelinggpt): AI-powered threat intelligence partner for security teams
